rules: Rule1: Whenever the artwork is auctioned by the house, it is cataloged in the database.
Rule2: If buyer1 bids on the artwork, then buyer1 wins the bid for the artwork.
Rule3: Either buyer1 bids on the artwork or buyer2 bids on the artwork.
Rule4: Whenever buyer2 bids on the artwork, the artwork is not damaged during transport.
Rule5: Either the artwork is reserved by the owner or, if buyer1 wins the bid for the artwork, then the artwork is not damaged during transport.
Rule6: Provided that the financial product is offered by the bank, it is packaged by the department.
Rule7: Under the condition that the financial product is offered by the bank, it is not accepted by the client.
Rule8: Either the financial product is listed on the auction or the artwork is not sold to the investor.
Rule9: If the financial product is advertised in the media, then it is not rejected by the client.
Rule10: Either the financial product is advertised in the media or it is promoted by the broker.
Rule11: Either the furniture is appraised by the specialist or the transaction is profitable.
Rule12: Either the furniture is custom, or it is modern, or, if it is antique, then it is not appraised by the specialist.
Rule13: Under the condition that the furniture is exhibited in the showroom, the transaction is profitable.
Rule14: If the furniture is loaned to the museum, then it is returned to the owner.
Rule15: Either the furniture is repaired by the craftsman, or it is rented to the tenant, or, if it is loaned to the museum, then it is not returned to the owner.
Rule16: If the furniture is polished by the worker, then either it is refurbished by the designer or it is not repaired by the craftsman.
Rule17: Under the condition that the furniture is moved by mover1, if it is stored in the warehouse, then it is protected with a cover.
Rule18: Either the furniture is moved by mover1 or by mover2.
Rule19: Whenever the furniture is moved by mover2, if it is stored in the warehouse, then it is protected with a cover.
Rule20: Provided that the financial product is verified by the regulator, if it is packaged by the department, then it is accepted by the client.
Rule21: Either the financial product is verified by the regulator or approved by the committee.
Rule22: If the artwork is displayed in the gallery, then if the furniture is purchased by the collector, the financial product is not listed on the auction.
Rule23: Either the artwork is displayed in the gallery or the financial product is evaluated by the appraiser.
Rule24: Under the condition that the financial product is approved by the committee, if it is packaged by the department, then it is accepted by the client.
Rule25: Provided that the artwork is diversified in the portfolio, the financial product is not offered by the bank.
Rule26: Either the artwork is analyzed by the critic or reviewed by the expert.
Rule27: Under the condition that the artwork is reviewed by the expert, if it is invested in by the fund, then it is diversified in the portfolio.
Rule28: If the artwork is framed by the framer, then if it is analyzed by the critic, it is valued by the market.
Rule29: Either the artwork is cleaned by the conservator or, if it is lit by the spotlight, then it is hung on the wall.
Rule30: If the artwork is insured under the policy, then the furniture is not stored in the warehouse.
Rule31: Either the artwork is insured under the policy or the financial product is traded on the market.
Rule32: If the furniture is restored by the conservator, then if the financial product is traded on the market, the furniture is not stored in the warehouse.

Rule33: If it is not the case that if the artwork is cataloged in the database then either it is authenticated by the expert or the transaction is profitable, then the artwork is damaged during transport.
Rule34: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the financial product is offered by the bank then it is accepted by the client, the financial product is rejected by the client.
Rule35: Provided that it is not the case that if the financial product is promoted by the broker then it is not rejected by the client, the financial product is withdrawn by the issuer.

Rule36: If it is not the case that if the financial product is evaluated by the appraiser then if the furniture is purchased by the collector the financial product is not listed on the auction, then the furniture is stored in the warehouse.
Rule37: If the furniture is not exhibited in the showroom, then it is loaned to the museum.
Rule38: Under the condition that the artwork is not framed by the framer, it is lit by the spotlight.
Rule39: If the transaction is not profitable, then the artwork is sold to the investor.
Rule40: Provided that the transaction is not profitable, the financial product is offered by the bank.
facts: Fact1: The artwork is auctioned by the house.
Fact3: The furniture is purchased by the collector.
Fact4: The furniture is polished by the worker.
Fact5: The artwork is invested in by the fund.
Fact6: The furniture is restored by the conservator.
Fact7: The artwork is not authenticated by the expert.
Fact8: The artwork is not reserved by the owner.
Fact9: The financial product is not withdrawn by the issuer.
Fact10: The furniture is not modern.
Fact11: The furniture is not custom.
Fact12: The furniture is not rented to the tenant.
Fact13: The furniture is not refurbished by the designer.
Fact14: The furniture is not protected with a cover.
Fact15: The artwork is not valued by the market.
Fact16: The artwork is not hung on the wall.
Fact17: The artwork is not cleaned by the conservator.
